description: The ID for this Youtube playlist result.
name: id

description: The ID of the Youtube base instance to which this playlist result belongs.
name: base_id

description: The index of this result within the list of results.
name: list_index

description: The title of this Youtube playlist result.
name: title

description: The source URL of this Youtube playlist result.
name: source_url

description: The publisher of this Youtube playlist result.
name: publisher

description: The URL of the publisher of this Youtube playlist result.
name: publisher_url

description: The image (either as a URL or Base64 string) of this Youtube playlist result.
name: image_thumbnail

description: The publication time of this Youtube playlist result; (desktop only).
name: time_of_publication

description: The number of videos featured in this Youtube playlist result.
name: number_of_videos

description: The list of titles within this Youtube playlist result; reconstructs a list of JSON objects with the 'playlist_showcase_items_source_urls' and 'playlist_showcase_items_running_times' fields; (desktop only).
name: playlist_showcase_items_titles

description: The list of source URLs within this Youtube playlist result; reconstructs a list of JSON objects with the 'playlist_showcase_items_titles' and 'playlist_showcase_items_running_times' fields; (desktop only).
name: playlist_showcase_items_source_urls

description: The list of running times (in seconds) within this Youtube playlist result; reconstructs a list of JSON objects with the 'playlist_showcase_items_titles' and 'playlist_showcase_items_source_urls' fields; (desktop only).
name: playlist_showcase_items_running_times
